name: Diversions / Withdrawals / Returns
functionStatement: Quantity + quality of inflow (tributaries, ditches, and pipes) does not provide harmful peaks or pollution, and supports diverse habitat conditions.
descriptionMarkdown: Diversions/returns are minimal, flow remains near natural regime without artificial additions/withdrawals.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Map withdrawals, returns, and ditches that affect the reach using local diversion layers or mapped canals and ditches.

inputs.label: Diversions / Withdrawals / Returns
inputs.helpMarkdown: High resolution aerial imagery; Field photos; Brief field recon; Historical evidence

levels.label: Good
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Good: No significant withdrawals or returns. Flows remain near natural. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

levels.label: Fair
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: Minor ditches or returns with limited effect. / Moderate diversions or returns causing seasonal stress. (Suggested index range 0.40-0.69)

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Poor: Large or chronic diversions or returns that drastically alter the flow regime. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.39)
